text: The cricket teams of Bangladesh and Scotland have played against each other in One Day Internationals since 1999. They have met on 4 occasions. Bangladesh is most successful with 3 victories while Scotland has not won any games. The other game was abandoned without a ball played. ==Summary of results== Total Won by Bangladesh Won by Scotland Tie/No Result In Bangladesh 2 2 0 0 In Scotland 2 1 0 1 In Neutral Venue 0 0 0 0 Total 4 3 0 1 ==List of ODIs== ===Key=== * (D/L) denotes that the Duckworthâ€“Lewis method was used in the match * # denotes that the team batting second were chasing a revised target Legend World Cup ICC Champions Trophy No. Date Winning Team Result Venue Scorecard 1 24 May 1997 Won by 22 runs Edinburgh Scorecard 2 15 December 2006 Won by 6 wickets Dhaka Scorecard 3 17 December 2006 Won by 146 runs Dhaka Scorecard == Related pages == *Bangladesh national cricket team *Scotland national cricket team == References == == Other websites == *ESPNcricinfo Category:Lists of international cricket matches Category:Bangladeshi cricket lists Category:Sport in Scotland
